title: remotemass
author: remotemass
content: I am looking to find the name of the show and the name of the guy hosting the show that was broadcasting a new episode of that video log bitcoin news podcast every single week or so, back in 2011 or so.The name of the show was something very plain like: "The Weekly Bitcoin Show" or "Bitcoin Show Week".He and his family lost all his bitcoin. How much was that and what was his name and show? I am pretty sure that I may find out who were the thieves.- remotemasshttps://bountify.co/bitcoin-heist-of-around-2010-2011

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: remotemass on August 08, 2022, 12:33:16 PMI am looking to find the name of the show and the name of the guy hosting the show that was broadcasting a new episode of that video log bitcoin news podcast every single week or so, back in 2011 or so.The name of the show was something very plain like: "The Weekly Bitcoin Show" or "Bitcoin Show Week".He and his family lost all his bitcoin. How much was that and what was his name and show? I am pretty sure that I may find out who were the thieves.- remotemasshttps://bountify.co/bitcoin-heist-of-around-2010-2011If you cant find the name of the Show and how much BTC was stolen, then what make you think you will find who was the thieves?If you can share more information about what are you looking for that will make it easy for us to help you. And about the bounty to be honest $1 as bounty is a joke. Better avoid offering a bounty and find users who can do it just for fun.I hope you really find the thieves, good luck.
